Table 11: P rotocol#2 measurement on the estimation results from the simulated scenes. Training and testing on ground 
truth 2d joint locations plus different levels of additive gaussian noise. 

simulation to quantitatively evaluate the performance and 
compare with other approaches. In contrast to static back-
ground and cameras capture setting, outdoor has more dy-
namic and unrestricted environment with frequent occlusion 
and high variation in background/foreground objects appear-
ance.
